text: So now that you’re in a new school and studies, have a think about what kinds of projects you would like to work together on? Several small ones, an ongoing larger idea or goal, industry insight, or anything else :smiley:

I don’t think I have enough free time to work on a big project right now. But industry insight would be really good because I need to find work experience for March so learning more about the industry might give me some ideas on where I can start looking and who to contact:sweat_smile:
Cool. Work experience. What are the details? For how long? Do you need to submit a piece of artwork or written report at the end? Etc...
It’s just for one week. I don’t think we need to submit a piece of artwork but they haven’t really given us any details.
